channel.title: Happy Ending
channel.description:
I have a story. Grab your pickaxes, because i'm about to rock your world. Strap yourself down and steal one of your little sisters tampons, because you're going to piss yourself in excitement. I exaggerate, but i just had to share the events of last night with you guys. I'm not the most active of fellows here anymore, so hello.
Anyway, so i had just went to the clubs. It was around 2 or 3 and i had got a few numbers over the night. A cute little irish bird and some typical barbie looking lass. Even still, i hadn't got any sexual release at any time. So out of frustration and curiosity, i decided to enterthe massage parlour that was on the way back to our car. It was 90 dollars for half an hour, with a happy ending. For those who are 12 here (majority), a happy ending is when they give you a hand job at the end of a massage.
So we got in the room and i was with this asian, much to my disappointment. The other girl with the tats was preoccupied. This was my first time doing something like this, but i wasn't nervous at all. Intoxication helped. I stripped and we skipped straight to the happy ending on my request. She was getting there real fast, so i told her to slow down. Eventually, i ran out of the time. In fear of blue balls, i bought another half an hour. But the girl was finished, so another had to replace her. You can only imagine my joy as this hot blonde goddess entered the blue-lit room. We spoke at the same time. Scuba instructor. Too good to be true. Eventually i got her real name. 'Baily'. Diamond being her fake name.
As she lent over halfway through, i sucked the nipples. You're not supposed to touch the girl, so i said "fuck, sorry". She said it was fine and then whispered to me, "i'll give you a special bonus tonight. It's been ten hours and i'm bored". Grabs my hand, sticks it in her. Gets on top of me and starts sucking me off. I know it's dirty, but we did the 69er. Part of me was worried about STDS, the other just wanted the pink taco.
So after dishing out 180 dollars and now a doctors appointment to get myself checked out, i still feel like Charlie Sheen today. I just stole 5 minutes out of your life too, fuckers.
The end.
